actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An act to prevent the importation of impure and unwholesome tea", approved March 2, 1897, so as to require the imposition of a fee under such act sufficient to pay for the tea examination program carried out under such Act.

summary.text: Requires the imposition of an import fee sufficient to pay for the tea examination program carried out under present law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An act to prevent the importation of impure and unwholesome tea", approved March 2, 1897, so as to require the imposition of a fee under such act sufficient to pay for the tea examination program carried out under such Act.
